posts.text:
Vinsamlega hringið í uppgefið númer, ekki svara hér.
Suzuki Grand Vitara	
Ár	2010		
Akstur	79.000	
Skipting	Beinskiptur		
Eldsneyti	Bensín	
Tegund	Jeppi		
Skipti	Engin skipti	
Fjöldi sæta	5		
Fjöldi dyra	5	
Fjöldi strokka	4		
Skoðaður	Já	
Litur	Grár		
Verð: 2.390.000 staðgreitt
Ath. engin skipti
 
Til sölu: Suzuki Grand Vitara Premium, A/C, Vökvastýri, Veltistýri, ABS hemlar, Spólvörn, Stöðugleikakerfi, Tauáklæði, Hiti í framsætum, Armpúði, Höfuðpúðar aftan, Loftkæling, Aksturstölva, Fjarstýrðar samlæsingar, Geislaspilari, Kastarar, Líknarbelgir, Rafdrifnar rúður, Rafdrifnir speglar, Útvarp, Varadekkshlíf, Þakbogar, ISOFIX festingar 
Reyklaus og snyrtilegt bill, nýtt í bremsum (25.07.2016), Þjónustubók, Smurbók 
Næsta skoðun: 2018 
235/65R17 TXL Nokian Rotiiva AT jeppadekk, Álfelgur 
We are a German family and leaving Iceland after wonderful years. We are selling our great car for a very good value. The car is available from 30.08.2016. Therefore, we give a discount of 300.000 ISK to comparable Grand Vitaras.  The price is therefore 2.390.000
The car was owned by non-smokers. 
The car is equipped with all necessary "off-road" tools, such as permanent four wheel drive, differential lock and reduction gear unit. Further, the car is on snow- and ice-proof All Terrain tires (235/65R17 TXL Nokian Rotiiva AT) with a profile of still 70%. For comfort, it has an automatic climate system, heated and electrical mirrors, heated front seats, car radio with CD, in total three 12V sockets (two in front, one in the luggage compartment) and Isofix. Mileage: 79000 km. The next official check is in 2018. 
All check ups/inspections and oil-changes/lubrications have been done completely and kept record in the book. The car just got new brakes on 25.07.2016. 
For any kind of questions, just contact me. 
S. 7787946  Tobias
